channel.title: Network Automation and Security Projects on Biketopolis
channel.description: Recent content in Network Automation and Security Projects on Biketopolis

item.title: How to Configure AzureAD SAML Authentication for AnyConnect VPN on Meraki
item.description: Configuration steps on AzureAD and Meraki Dashboards # This guide seems redundant, but there are some quirks that are not accounted for in the official Meraki documentation.

item.title: How to Configure a SOCKS5 Proxy Server in AWS
item.description: How to Set Up an AWS EC2 as a SOCKS5 Proxy # Summary # This guide will walk you through how to configure an Amazon EC2 as a SOCKS5 proxy.

item.title: How to Configure SAML SSO to Meraki Dashboard Using JumpCloud
item.description: Summary # In this guide, I will walk you through how I configured Single Sign-On to my Meraki Dashboard using JumpCloud as the Identity Provider.
